profile:
Connextions LTD is an installation and service provider dedicated to connecting you to telecommunications and home electronic services you are in need of. Our team of professional technicians are licensed to install Satellite Television, Security Alarms, Surveillance Cameras, Low Voltage Wiring, Central Vacuum Systems, and also Internet Services.

Our experienced and knowledgeable technicians service in the East from Mississauga up to Caledon all the way to the West around the Kitchener area down to Hamilton. 

We operate 365 days a year to service any issue at your convenience. 
Our office hours are:
Monday through Friday: 9:00 am - 4:00 pm 
Saturday and Sunday: 10:00 am - 4:00 pm
Call today for any and all inquiries: 905-636-0300 or toll free at 1-844-636-0300
